communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Dear City Clerk,

I am writing to request access to all records, contracts , receipts , and financial information related to the services provided at the homeless camp located at 1720 Novato Blvd , Lee Gerner Park aka Camp Compassion in Novato , Ca . between January 1st 2020-October 30th 2024

Specifically , I am interested in the following information; 

Service Providers:
A list of all companies or organizations contracted to provide services at Lee Gerner Park encampment aka Camp Compassion.
Copies of all contracts or agreements with these service :providers . 
																	
Services:      
A detailed list of the services provided , including but not limited to :
    *Rat abatement and rodent control
    * Clean ups Crews 
    * Garbage Service 
    * Porta potty / handwashing station rental and maintenance 
    *Security 
     * Electric cost and estimates for repairs   
     * Tree work arborist 
    * Maintenance or repairs 

Costs :    
A breakdown of the costs associated with each service provided including : 
  *Hourly rates or fixed fees 
  * Material Costs 
 *Overhead expenses 
Cost of supplies purchased by the City of Novato , such as tents, tarps, sleeping bags , sleeping matts , Canopies or any other supplies, please include receipts or other documentation supporting these purchases. 


Funding : 
A detailed explanation of how the city obtained the funds to operate the homeless camp at Lee Gerner Park aka Camp Compassion, including: 
     *Grant information
      *Budget allocations

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robbie Powelson

title: City of Novato, Camp Compassion, Homeless Camp Evictions and Policies

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: City of Novato, Camp Compassion, Homeless Camp Evictions and Policies
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Subject; FOIA Request - Homeless Camp Evictions


	I am writing to request any and all records, policies and procedures related to evictions and applications at the temporary camp located at 1720 Novato Blvd, Novato, Ca in Lee Gerner Park aka Camp Compassion.

 	Specifically , I am interested in the following information: 

Evictions : 
Any and all records or documentation, memos or memorandum of understanding related to evictions of Sheila and Crystal, Bryan Duran and Jess Tassi From the temporary camp at Lee Gerner Park aka Camp Compassion From 2021 thru present 
Any communications with the City of Novato  or its agents or service providers related to Sheila and Crystals eviction from Sanctioned encampment at Lee Garner Park aka Camp Compassion including emails, memos or meeting minutes or memorandum of understanding Novato Police Department or its agents, advise given regarding eviction and allowing violence to continue From January 2024 thru July 2024 . 
All evictions and notices , contracts , and agreements related to the evictions of all camp residents from the Motel /hotel program  at the Days Inn Located at from the City of Novato after the fire from  July 30, 2024 ending Aug 30, 2024. 
Records of any hearings or appeals related to these evictions 
Information regarding the reasons for the evictions, including allegations of violence or not following code of conduct, hoarding or any requests for evictions made to the City of Novato  from the Marin County chapter or The California Homeless Union.
Details about why these individuals were not evicted despite allegations of violence , and misconduct , hate speech and hoarding behavior or at the request of union designee(s)
Information about the City's Failure to appear on a scheduled eviction date . 


City Policies : 
   Copies of all city policies or procedures governing evictions from the homeless camp located at 1720 Novato Blvd , Lee Gerner Park aka Camp Compassion. 
Information about the criteria used to determine whether a resident of the camp should be evicted. 
Details about the process for serving eviction notices and conducting hearings. 


Motel/Hotel Program : 
Information about the motel program implemented after the fire on July 30, 2024 at the temporary camp located at 1720 Novato Blvd, Novato , Ca Lee Gerner Park aka Camp Compassion. 
The total cost to the City of Novato for housing the homeless camp residents from Lee Gerner Park at the Days Inn 8141 Redwood BLVD Novato, Ca , Inn Marin located at 250 Entrada Dr Novato, and Motel 6  located at 737 Francisco BLVD W, San Rafael, Ca from July 30, 2024 thru  September 20 , 2024. 
Copies of any contracts or agreements signed by residents participating in  the motel program or staying at the motels from camp compassion aka temporary camp at Lee Gerner Park, Novato , Ca.
Notices of communications posted at the motels regarding the motel program or expected end date .
Any requests for assistance from Novato Police regarding Griff Squire in connection to the motel program. 
Any requests from the City of Novato to the Novato Police department regarding Michael Robertson and Kathy Plumb's refusal to leave the  Days Inn between Aug 20,2024  and August 30, 2024. 


Applications: 
   Copies of all applications received by the City of Novato from individuals seeking to live at the temporary camp at Lee Garner Park at 1720 Novato Blvd, Novato, Ca aka Camp Compassion. 
Information about the number of applications received and the criteria used to select residents . 

Please provide any records that fall within the scope of this request , including but not limited to : 
Eviction Notices 
Hearing transcripts 
Policy documents 
Application forms 
Correspondence from the City of Novato to the camp residents 
Motel Contracts 
Notices posted at the Motel.
Police reports or incident reports related to Griff Squire and MIchael Robertson.



Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robbie Powelson

title: City of Novato, Camp Compassion, Police Contact

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: City of Novato, Camp Compassion, Police Contact
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to request access to all records, communications , or directives related to the City of Novato ‘s interactions with the Novato Police department regarding the homeless camp  located at 1720 Novato Blvd , Lee Gerner Park aka Camp Compassion. 

Specifically , I am interested in any documents , emails, or other correspondence that may indicate instructions from the city of Novato to the Novato Police Department regarding the frequency or extent of police presence or intervention at the homeless camp. Please provide any records that fall within the scope of this request , including but not limited to :


Memos 
Emails 
Letters 
Directives 
Policy documents

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robbie Powelson
